notes:
### v1.9.9
#### NEW FEATURES
- added option to start meter with windows (settings > accessibility)

![start_with_windows image](https://i.imgur.com/nequiKu.png)

#### BUG FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS
- rdps tab in logs now show status message if it failed to load


apologies for the constant small updates x.x

full patch notes on [github](https://github.com/snoww/loa-logs/releases/latest)

send bug reports/suggestions to [#loa-logs](https://discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5)
